forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy. Low around 71, with temperatures rising to around 73 overnight. South southwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8am and 9am. Mostly cloudy. High near 83, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. West wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
